segments.text: I see the woman is so focused on that plate, like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even notice the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, climbing up that stool like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool is going to tip, and it’s going to be a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just spreading everywhere, and she’s not doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she is while everything is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, but I can’t blame them for wanting cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so chaotic, but she’s completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to turn off that faucet before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
